summary: Provides a Python wrapper class that groups MAPDL commands for configuring nonlinear solution options, enabling users to set parameters such as convergence criteria, load stepping, and solver controls within ANSYS Mechanical APDL.
business_intent: Facilitate programmatic control of nonlinear analysis settings in ANSYS MAPDL through a high‑level, object‑oriented interface, simplifying automation and integration of simulation workflows.
